description_text:
Good afternoon! Can you tell me what to do? I'm having a problem with my
brake pedal. The program always shows that it's 100% depressed, but it
doesn't calibrate.

conversations.body_text: Hi Артём Черепенин,  Hello, the version you provided is too outdated. Please download SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0. You can manually update the firmware by following these steps: Go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → Select Pedals → Choose the plus.sfu file to upgrade. Once the update is completed, the issue should be resolved.      https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
